segments.text: Wow , what a cool car ! The styling of this car really appeals to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this is a very popular car .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to buy it . How much does this car cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The car is beautiful , isn't it ? Come on inside and we'll discuss the price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can tell me here . I just want to know the price .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 50000 yuan ' What a deal ! That will , of course , include tax , licence , and registration fee .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I appreciate your help , but I think I'll look around a bit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then what price would be fair to you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that 30000 yuan would be fair for this car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can see that you are a smart buyer . Forty thousand is my best price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can't you make it cheaper ? I still can't afford the car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hum ... OK . I will take it .
segments.speaker: S1
